short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes, when I hit ctrl-w in Chrome, I make a 'pew' laser sound. (http://twitter.com/#!/jamesthigpen/status/116216027204960257)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension plays a 'pew' sound when a Chrome tab is closed, sometimes.

This extension does NOT collect, use, or share any user data.
